data.lyric:
[ti:NICE (Explicit)]
[ar:The Carters]
[al:EVERYTHING IS LOVE (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.48]NICE (Clean) - The Carters
[00:01.13]Lyricist：Pharrell Williams/Beyoncé/S. Carter
[00:02.08]Composer：Pharrell Williams/Beyoncé/S. Carter
[00:03.91]Beyoncé/Pharrell：
[00:05.83]I can do anything yeah
[00:09.79]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[00:13.74]I can do anything yeah
[00:17.64]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[00:21.65]I can do anything yeah
[00:25.65]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[00:29.62]I can do anything yeah
[00:33.54]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[00:37.52]JAY-Z：
[00:37.71]Yeah look f**k your subpoenas and your misdemeanors
[00:39.99]Was too busy touring out all your arenas
[00:41.94]My passport is tatted it look like it's active
[00:44.02]I play on these planes y'all catch me in traffic
[00:45.86]Y'all drag me in court for that sh*t y'all backwards
[00:47.95]After all these years of drug trafficking huh
[00:50.31]Time to remind me I'm Black again huh
[00:52.25]All this talking back I'm too arrogant huh
[00:54.21]What would you do you knew you couldn't fail
[00:55.75]I have no fear of anything do everything well
[00:57.98]I have no fear of jail I was born in the trap
[01:00.07]I have no fear of death we all born to do that
[01:02.77]It's just life I'm just nice tonight I might raise my price
[01:06.64]Great advice d**n you Hov Jesus Christ
[01:09.40]Beyoncé/Pharrell：
[01:09.70]I can do anything yeah
[01:13.65]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[01:17.66]I can do anything yeah
[01:21.62]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[01:25.39]JAY-Z：
[01:25.64]And I'm nice nice nice nice nice nice nice
[01:29.58]Up all night night night night night night night
[01:33.79]Running from the lights lights lights lights lights lights lights
[01:37.46]Covered in ice ice ice ice ice ice ice
[01:41.78]Beyoncé：
[01:42.10]Patiently waiting for my demise
[01:44.23]'Cause my success can't be quantified
[01:45.99]If I gave two f**ks about streaming numbers
[01:47.86]Would have put Lemonade up on Spotify
[01:50.06]F**k you f**k you you're cool f**k you I'm out ah
[01:58.16]I ain't never seen a ceiling in my whole life that's word to Blue
[02:01.59]Freestyling live blueprint from my Jigga who never writes
[02:05.83]I'm so nice I'm everybody type godd**n right
[02:09.64]I'm so nice Jesus Christ I'm better than the hype I give you life
[02:13.31]Beyoncé/Pharrell：
[02:13.64]I can do anything yeah
[02:17.71]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[02:21.74]I can do anything yeah
[02:25.67]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[02:29.38]JAY-Z：
[02:29.59]And I'm nice nice nice nice nice nice nice
[02:33.50]Up all night night night night night night night
[02:37.47]Running from the lights lights lights lights lights lights lights
[02:41.47]Covered in ice ice ice ice ice ice ice
[02:45.24]Beyoncé：
[02:45.57]Last name gon' be here forever
[02:47.63]Now we finna float like feathers
[02:49.68]Me and Hova do it like rebels
[02:51.64]Most of y'all jits got pebbles
[02:53.60]I got the Rocs and the Fella
[02:55.57]Ice lightning bolts from the Heavens
[02:57.70]Y'all gon' have to watch us eat eat
[02:59.49]Pharrell：
[02:59.69]Stocked up like the doomsday preppers
[03:01.55]Anybody ever had an era when things could've been better
[03:05.65]Feeling like you was on a stretcher
[03:07.64]And all you remember was the Hecklers
[03:09.55]But the Universe lifts that weight
[03:11.59]Then you shine like a new feather
[03:13.59]Blessings on blessings etcetera
[03:15.62]Feeling like the best year ever d**n it's nice
[03:18.17]Beyoncé/Pharrell：
[03:18.53]I can do anything yeah
[03:21.73]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[03:25.61]I can do anything yeah
[03:29.63]Hell nah hell nah hell nah hell nah
[03:33.62]JAY-Z：
[03:33.77]And I'm nice nice nice nice nice nice nice
[03:37.52]Up all night night night night night night night
[03:41.46]Running from the lights lights lights lights lights lights lights
[03:45.57]Covered in ice ice ice ice ice ice ice
data.trans:
[ti:NICE (Explicit)]
[ar:The Carters]
[al:EVERYTHING IS LOVE (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.48]//
[00:01.13]//
[00:02.08]//
[00:03.91]//
[00:05.83]我什么都能做
[00:09.79]鬼才信
[00:13.74]我什么都能做
[00:17.64]鬼才信
[00:21.65]我什么都能做
[00:25.65]鬼才信
[00:29.62]我什么都能做
[00:33.54]鬼才信
[00:37.52]//
[00:37.71]看 才不管你的传票和轻罪
[00:39.99]我正忙着在你的竞技场上驰骋呢
[00:41.94]我的护照上有各种图案 就像是匪徒身上的纹身
[00:44.02]我在飞机上玩 你们在路上看到我了
[00:45.86]你们为了那些破事把我告上法庭 你们都背叛我
[00:47.95]经过这么多年的**走私
[00:50.31]是时候再提醒自己 我是**
[00:52.25]不停地顶嘴 我太傲慢了
[00:54.21]你会怎么做 你知道你不会失败的
[00:55.75]我什么都不怕 做好一切事情
[00:57.98]我不怕坐牢 我生活在欺骗之中
[01:00.07]我不怕死亡 我们谁也逃不过一死
[01:02.77]这就是人生 我很好 今晚我可能会提高出场价格
[01:06.64]建议很好 管它什么耶和华 耶稣基督
[01:09.40]//
[01:09.70]我什么都能做
[01:13.65]鬼才信
[01:17.66]我什么都能做
[01:21.62]鬼才信
[01:25.39]//
[01:25.64]我很好
[01:29.58]整夜没睡觉
[01:33.79]在灯光下狂欢
[01:37.46]浑身都是钻石
[01:41.78]//
[01:42.10]耐心地等待我的死亡
[01:44.23]因为我的成功是无法量化的
[01:45.99]我要是真的在乎流量
[01:47.86]就会把《Lemonade》放在Spotify上
[01:50.06]你这么酷 我落伍了
[01:58.16]我这辈子从来没有被什么限制过 这句话是给我的女儿Blue的
[02:01.59]自由自在地活着 从来不写歌的JAY-Z发表了一张专辑《The Blueprint》
[02:05.83]我很好 我是每个人都喜欢的类型 对极了
[02:09.64]我这么好 上帝 我比那些就知道炒作的人好多了  我给了你生命
[02:13.31]//
[02:13.64]我什么都能做
[02:17.71]鬼才信
[02:21.74]我什么都能做
[02:25.67]鬼才信
[02:29.38]//
[02:29.59]我很好
[02:33.50]整夜没睡觉
[02:37.47]在灯光下狂欢
[02:41.47]浑身都是钻石
[02:45.24]//
[02:45.57]我的姓氏永远不会被遗忘
[02:47.63]此刻 我们像羽毛一样在空中飘荡
[02:49.68]我和耶和华像反叛者一样
[02:51.64]你们大多数人都有**
[02:53.60]而我得到了洛克菲勒的生财之道
[02:55.57]天空中出现了雷霆闪电
[02:57.70]你们却只能看着我们吃饭
[02:59.49]//
[02:59.69]像末日生存者一样备好一切
[03:01.55]每个人都经历过一个时代 那时一切都可以变得更好
[03:05.65]感觉你像是躺在担架上
[03:07.64]你记得的只有那些捣乱的人
[03:09.55]宇宙承担着整个地球的重量
[03:11.59]你就像一根新羽毛一样闪亮
[03:13.59]无数的祝福
[03:15.62]感觉这是有史以来最好的一年 感觉真好
[03:18.17]//
[03:18.53]我什么都能做
[03:21.73]鬼才信
[03:25.61]我什么都能做
[03:29.63]鬼才信
[03:33.62]//
[03:33.77]我很好
[03:37.52]整夜没睡觉
[03:41.46]在灯光下狂欢
[03:45.57]浑身都是钻石
